entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 6:42 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
